object.name: member
object.property: <model xmlns:security="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/security" xmlns:marshal="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/marshal" xmlns:form="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/form" xmlns:indexer="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/indexer" xmlns="http://namespaces.plone.org/supermodel/schema"> <schema> <field name="fullname" type="zope.schema.TextLine"> <description/> <title>Fullname</title> </field> <field name="biography" type="zope.schema.Text"> <description/> <title>Biography</title> </field> <field name="birth_date" type="zope.schema.Date"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Birth date</title> </field> <field name="birth_datetime" type="zope.schema.Datetime"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Birth date with time</title> </field> <field name="subscription" type="zope.schema.Choice"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>subscription</title> <values> <element>silver</element> <element>gold</element> <element>platinum</element> </values> </field> <field name="amount" type="zope.schema.Int" security:read-permission="cmf.ManagePortal"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>amount</title> </field> <field name="languages" type="zope.schema.Set"> <description/> <required>False</required> <title>Languages</title> <value_type type="zope.schema.Choice"> <vocabulary>plone.app.vocabularies.AvailableContentLanguages</vocabulary> </value_type> </field> </schema> </model>
